titles.title: To exclude certain properties from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-359.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 209.

bill.summary: 11/17/2003--Reported to House amended. Corrects a technical error in the original official map of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Matagorda Peninsula Unit T07/T07P, by replacing it with a new official map (that excludes the Matagorda Dunes Homesites Subdivision, in Matagorda County, Texas, from that Unit of the System). Directs the Secretary of the Interior to keep such replacement map on file and available for inspection in accordance with the Coastal Barrier Resources Act.
